alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 1:51PM CDT until July 08 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Box Butte County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northwestern Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 130 PM MDT. * At 1251 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Alice, or 11 miles north of Scottsbluff, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kilpatrick Lake, Lake Minatare Campground, Lake Minatare and Lake Alice. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; Sioux
